entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
